name: Shield of Reflection
effects: Casts a barrier on up to one target ally, reflecting the next attack targeted on that ally. Prevents up to 1d6 + [FAI] damage.
flavor: When the hordes are upon you, Shiro's faithful shall stand ever vigilant as the waves crash upon the stone, and are dispersed. -Krul, Priest of Shiro

name: Inspire
effects: Add 1 to all attack rolls made by your party until the end of the encounter.
flavor: All it takes to light the way is one candle burning brightly in the night.

name: Siphon Light
effects: Steal the life force of another creature and siphon it into an ally, healing them for half the damage done, rounded up.
flavor: Hope is never so distant that a single ray of light cannot give those in darkness a way out.

name: Blind
effects: Blinds the target with spheres of darkness, reducing their attack rolls by 4 (DC 8 + [FAI]).

name: Shadow Stalker
effects: You fade into darkness replaced by a doppelganger made of pure darkness. Your next attack brings you out of the shadows dealing additional damage.
flavor: The darkness that surrounds you cannot hurt you. But I will. -Saz'rac, Priest of Kazu

name: Paranoia
flavor: My head is a very dark place. Soon yours will be as well.

name: Agonizing Bond
effects: Bonds two enemies together. Damage dealt to one is dealt to the other as well.
flavor: Your numbers do nothing but increase my strength. -Tenkan, Priest of Dolo

name: Fiendfyre
effects: Deals damage in a small area. Has a chance to set enemies on fire, dealing 1d4 fire damage to the enemy when they take an action (DC 10 + [FAI]).
flavor: My fire will teach you to fear the light.

name: Dolo's Fury
effects:
Your body erupts in a fury of fire and blood. You lose control of yourself attacking anyone within melee reach for 3d6 + [FAI] damage each round. After attacking, roll a d20:
 1-10: Your fury ends, your body crumbles into its natural state. You lose 1 hit point.
 11-17: Lose 1 hit point.
 18-20: Lose 2 hit points.
flavor: Monsters are real. They live inside us. And sometimes, they win.

name: Thorn Bind
effects: Wraps the target enemy in magical thorns, preventing their movement and dealing an additional [FAI] damage each round until they break free (DC 12 + [FAI]).
flavor: Thorns that hold you to the ground, thorns that keep you solidly bound.

name: Summon Lesser Felbeast
effects: Summons a lesser felbeast that has 1d8+ [FAI] hit points and deals FAI damage when attacking.
flavor: Never come between a felbeast and its prey, unless you wish to become its prey.
